items.sentence: I can't believe that Tom really expects me to do that.
How many projects have you and Tom worked on together?
The only reason Tom did that was because he was drunk.
Please turn to page 3 and look at the third paragraph.
It's better to attack than to let oneself be attacked.
Tom is shorter and weighs considerably less than Mary.
Tom was just a poor musician before he was discovered.
Tom stood behind the locked door, trembling with fear.
Tom listened to the messages on his answering machine.
Is it true that Tom and Mary are going to get married?
